GSD.description:
f2fs: fix to do sanity check on destination blkaddr during recovery

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.0.3 by commit 3a4d24d746866dd45d970bd565ff3886e839366a. For more details please see the references link.
